events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection last night.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords provided in the report.
Agent John Smith was assigned to the claim to assist the customer with the next steps promptly.
The claim was officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the claim process and timelines.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police accident report, and repair estimates from the customer.
Customer uploaded all required documents including repair quotes and official accident report for review.
Investigation into the accident details and liability was initiated by the claims team.
Investigation concluded confirming the customer's vehicle was at fault but damages are covered under policy.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and any associated expenses for the customer.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the settlement offer presented.
Payments to cover the approved repair costs were issued to the auto repair shop promptly.
The claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and final feedback from the customer.
